name: .PMJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .PMJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Pegasus Mail, a client email program; contains mailbox configuration information, such as default mail views; commonly found with the file name state.pmj in the root directory of a Pegasus Mail installation.

content: PMJ files are stored in a plain text format with a series of sections denoted by square brackets. Some sections include "[GENERAL]" and "[READER]."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
